subtitles:
35527 38599 People once believed
that when someone dies...

38687 42805 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

42887 46118 But sometimes,
something so bad happens...

46207 51235 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

51327 54239 Then, sometimes--
just sometimes--

54327 59117 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.

111487 115799 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

115887 119926 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

123287 126757 - Sir, we gotta move her.

126847 129759 - All right, guys, let's do it.

cleared this with me first.

to me about Shelly.
216647 218558 She's gonna die, isn't she?

227247 232685 Now, come on.
Come on, it's okay.
234727 236718 She's gonna be fine.

All that is left is ashes.

258527 260995 I used to think
that was true about everything--
261087 265285 families, friends, feelings.

265367 269121 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

269207 273325 two people who are meant to be
together-- nothing can keep them apart.

like the night watchman?

this place needs...
335807 338685 is a good natural catastrophe.

like in the Bible.
